titles: The cities X commandements, commanded to be read in all churches, by Mr L. Warner and the Common Councell.
author: Warner, John, Sir, d. 1648 attributed name.
City of London (England). Court of Common Council attributed name.
notes: A satire; not in fact by Sir John Warner or the Court of Common Council.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
The cities X commandments -- The city Lords prayer -- The cities creed.
